title: 20 Hours up and still havent recieved my RP
body: I bought 4k rp yesterday. And still havent recieved my 4k rp. I wanna buy the thresh skin before the time runs out please make this happen i need my rp please please

replies.body: Sometimes the servers get a bit overloaded with all the purchase requests. Not to worry, though, if you reach out to our billing team, we can assist you with this and get you on track to grab Thresh's skin. [Submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the information on your transaction and we'll be happy to help.
Ive waited over 26 hours now. Im scared that the thresh skin sale is gonna expire please help me..

In most events that you're unable to purchase something due to an issue on our end, we're happy to honor a sale price that you missed. Remain patient while a billing specialist gets back to you, and we'll be able to sort this out as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Hello, ive legit waited 6 days for some rp. And then i need to talk about my thresh skin sales it would take another 2-5 days. Please fix this for me. I just want my skin and champions to play with.
Hello and thanks for your answer, that helped me alot. I was so stressed that i wasn't gonna get it
